fr.adneom.arrayslicer.utils.impl

Class AdneomArrayUtils<T>

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<List<T>> partition(List<T> list, int chunkSize)
      Utility method used for slicing list of items
      to multiple sublist having specified size (chunkSize)
      Using java8 Collectors library to chunk list Example 1 : Inputs : list = [1,2,3,4,5] and chunkSize = 2 Output: [ [1,2], [3,4], [5] ] Example 2 : Inputs : list = [1,2,3,4,5] and chunkSize = 3 Output: [ [1,2,3], [4,5] ] Example 3 : Inputs : list = [1,2,3,4,5] and chunkSize = 1 Output: [ [1], [2], [3], [4], [5] ]

      NB : If the input list is Empty, il will return an empty collection

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • partition

        public List<List<T>> partition(@Nullable
                               List<T> list,
                               int chunkSize)
        Description copied from interface: IAdneomArrayUtils

        Utility method used for slicing list of items
        to multiple sublist having specified size (chunkSize)
        Using java8 Collectors library to chunk list

        Example 1 :

        • Inputs : list = [1,2,3,4,5] and chunkSize = 2
        • Output: [ [1,2], [3,4], [5] ]

        Example 2 :

        • Inputs : list = [1,2,3,4,5] and chunkSize = 3
        • Output: [ [1,2,3], [4,5] ]

        Example 3 :

        • Inputs : list = [1,2,3,4,5] and chunkSize = 1
        • Output: [ [1], [2], [3], [4], [5] ]


        NB : If the input list is Empty, il will return an empty collection
        Specified by:
        partition in interface IAdneomArrayUtils<T>
        Parameters:
        list - the input list to chunk
        chunkSize - the size of sublists
        Returns:
        List containing sublists chunked
